title: Champion Select lag
body:
In the past few weeks during champion selection randomly my client freezes. I can see the chat typing and normally can select a champion but then from time to time I cant type into the chat, I can't select runes, masteries or my summoner spells

Anyone else having problems this way? Gets frustrating trying to do a mellee champion then have shield masteries and ap runes -_-

replies.body:
Hmmm... Based on the symptoms you've mentioned, I'd say your issue is caused by an *unstable connection* to our matchmaking servers. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are properly configured for League.

Let me know if this caused any changes for you.
